items.title: Republicans are scrambling after learning their proposed cuts to Medicaid, which would offset trillions in tax breaks, violate Senate rules
items.description: It's a major blow to Trump's "big, beautiful" spending bill.

items.title: Conservatives and environmentalists say carbon capture is unnecessarily expensive and fails to curb pollution effectively. Here’s what the science says
items.description: Carbon capture and sequestration is seen by many as an important way to reduce pollution during a transition to renewable energy.

items.title: Fortnite players can cash in on another $126 million in refunds after being ‘tricked’ into unwanted purchases—here’s how
items.description: The refunds are part of a $520 million settlement that Epic agreed to pay back in 2022.

items.title: Why this former OpenAI researcher thinks it’s time to start gaming out AI’s future
items.description: Former OpenAI safety researcher Steven Adler explains why simulating AI’s rise could help us prepare.

items.title: The Trump administration just took a big step toward considering crypto assets during home loan applications
items.description: The directive is “in keeping with President Trump’s vision to make the United States the crypto capital of the world.”
